word:
I rode out to Jonestown. Brother Van Horn and Ellen Lane accompanied me. We had a special prayer for Cyrus. . . . I have visited Father Norton and 


                                     -429- 

prayed with him. He is much broken. Visited Brother Gardiner and prayed with him yesterday.--Letter 28, 1873. (To "Dear Sister Lucinda," December 17, 1873.)
